scripts.build: wp-scripts build classes/events-manager.js admin/admin-settings.js admin/taxonomies-admin.js blocks/src/backend.js blocks/src/frontend.js /blocks/src/booking.js add-ons/bookings-form/form-editor.js add-ons/bookings-form/events-manager-pro.js --output-path='./includes'
